channel.title: Adding New Rights
channel.description: Ok well i am using trisidiax and i wanna add a new right/rank called supporter. Can someone teach me how to do this? I am willing to use t.v or skype if that is what it takes.

Ok well i checked it again and it is ok…Also i did add a new tag thingy. But where do i change the one for yell ?

If you have a yell command with custom tags; like [Owner], [Mod], you add it there.

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Host Gushers:

Ok what do u mean fix them? There is nothing wrong with them

Assume you are adding the player right 5 (supporter)
if you have any right that says if(playerRights <= 1) (greater than or equal to) that would mean a supporter can do it too

item.title: Adding New Rights
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:9, topic:471855”]in player.java i found this.

public int playerRights;
public PlayerHandler handler = null;
public int playerItems[] = new int[28];
public int playerItemsN[] = new int[28];
public int bankItems[] = new int[Config.BANK_SIZE];
public int bankItemsN[] = new int[Config.BANK_SIZE];
public boolean bankNotes = false;[/quote]
That would mean your server doesn’t have a limit on how many playerRights you can have (technically it’s limit would be the highest number an int can be).
So that’s fine.

Read full topic

Host Gushers:

I have a image and i know where to put it put what should i name it? The last image is called MODICONS 4…What should i name this one? Also on the server side where do i search for the rights and add a new one?

MODICONS 5.
I’d look for something like "public int playerRights. I think it’s in either player.java or player assistant.java.

item.title: Adding New Rights
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Host Gushers:

Ok well i want a new rank called supporter and i want to add a image for it. Also when they yell i want it so that it says [supporter]

[client sided]

  1. You need to get the image
  2. You need to find how the client loads the player rights images
  3. You need to put the image with them
  4. You need to make the client load the image properly
  5. You need to make the client load the image in all forms of chat
    [Server sided]
  6. You need to edit the playerRights int so it can hold the new rank
  7. You need to edit your commands (all) so that new rank doesn’t interfere with the others (giving them abilities they shouldn’t)
  8. You need to edit your yell command so it has ranks.

Read full topic
